str2: (a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
Form, shape, outward appearance. Perhaps from the base of meros; shape; figuratively, nature.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
From ago; a field; genitive case, the country; specially, a farm, i.e. Hamlet.
